thread.title: Upper West Side Boutique Hotel
thread.title_full: Upper West Side Boutique Hotel - Review of NYLO New York City, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Phyllis & Richa... K
title: Upper West Side Boutique Hotel
text: NYLO is always a fun place to stay when visiting New York. It's in the heart of the Upper West Side so it's a noisy, fast paced area. Easy to get around the city from here with buses, subways, etc. The bar in the lobby is cozy but needs a little more sophistication (like snacks with the drinks,) Nice rooms but usually a typical city view (not beautiful). Some of the front desk staff could be friendlier.
